pr_title: Show reachable scores in course statistics and fix tooltips of scores

timeline.bodyText:
How do you handle programming exercises? I cant find a specific condition that match programming exercises?
It seems to work, I just could not figure out why, maybe you could add a comment for that?
timeline.author: sleiss

replies.bodyText: I believe programming exercises keep their initialized state even after they are done. Therefore the reachable score was added twice.
replies.author: sjagla27

timeline.bodyText: Could you please document what split.length == 2/4 corresponds to (which exercisetype)?
timeline.author: sleiss
sleiss

timeline.bodyText: Why do you need all those constants? As far as I can see you you just assign them below to reachable scores?
timeline.author: stefanwaldhauser

timeline.bodyText: Why do you need all those constants? As far as I can see you you just assign them below?
